title: Number of TV ads seen daily per person in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2008 to 2015
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Advertisements seen, with a total of 8 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2011 to 2008.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is moderately neutral which exists from 2013 to 2011.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is moderately neutral which exists from 2015 to 2014.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2014 to 2013.
gold: This statistic displays a timeline of the number of TV ads seen per individual per day in the United Kingdom from 2008 to 2015 . In 2012 , individuals saw on average 47 television commercials or advertisements per day .
